message: @slack-eng-mobile-bugs an anomaly has been detected on logins to Staging
name: [iOS] Staging Login Abnormality Detected
query: avg(last_15m):anomalies(sum:trace.rack.request.hits.by_http_status{resource_name:next::student::mobile::v2::signincontroller_create,env:staging} by {http.status_code}.as_count(), 'agile', 2, direction='both', interval=60, alert_window='last_15m', seasonality='hourly', timezone='utc', count_default_zero='true') >= 0.3
